https://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=329767 https://github.com/CastagnaIT/plugin.video.netflix v1.12.15 (2022-12-17) - IMPORTANT NOTICE: New changes to website is causing video quality to drop to 540p after about 20h, this add-on update implements a workaround to fix this problem by changing ESNs every 20h. The workaround works only when "Manual ESN" is not set, so if needed remove the previously Manual ESN set. You can find the new setting under add-on Expert settings. If necessary, you can manually generate new ESN's by selecting "Reset ESN" setting, or you can also disable the 540p workaround. - IMPORTANT NOTICE FOR ANDROID: Do NOT USE the ESN of the original app with the add-on, or will cause video quality drop to 540p also on the original android app for an unknown period of time. This problem cannot be solved by the add-on, there are no know solutions yet, so you can only report the 540p problem to customer service.

executable
Ttml2Ssa Library. Biblioteka Ttml2Ssa. Ttml2Ssa könyvtár Ttml2Ssa is a library that allows other addons to convert TTML/XML/DFXP/VTT/SRT subtitles to SRT and SSA/ASS formats. It also provides a configuration window where the user can adjust the SSA/ASS style and other options. Ttml2Ssa to biblioteka, która pozwala innym wtyczkom na konwersję napisów TTML/XML/DFXP/VTT/SRT do formatów SRT i SSA/ASS. Udostępnia również okno konfiguracyjne, w którym użytkownik może dostosować styl SSA/ASS i inne opcje. A Ttml2Ssa egy olyan könyvtár, amely lehetővé teszi más kiegészítők számára, hogy a TTML/XML/DFXP/VTT/SRT feliratokat SRT és SSA/ASS formátumokká alakítsák. Ezenkívül egy konfigurációs ablakot is biztosít, ahol a felhasználó beállíthatja az SSA/ASS stílust és egyéb beállításokat. all LGPL-2.1-or-later https://github.com/Paco8/ttml2ssa https://github.com/Paco8/ttml2ssa
